member.name: T:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.WeatherUndergroundRequired
member.summary: A class which exposes an instance of a class which holds information on Weather Underground's required branding. Please read their documents regarding terms and conditions online at http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/d/terms.html.

member.name: M:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.WeatherUndergroundRequired.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates this class using your API key only. This will use your IP address to determine your location.
member.param: Your Weather Underground free API key. If you do not yet have one, go to http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/ and sign up for one. It's quite easy.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.WeatherUndergroundRequired.WeatherUndergroundImageURL
member.summary: The URL to the Weather Underground's logo image. Please read their terms for use (which is required).

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.WeatherUndergroundRequired.WeatherUndergroundImageTitle
member.summary: The title to be displayed for the Weather Underground's logo image. Please read their terms for use (which is required).

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.WeatherUndergroundRequired.WeatherUndergroundImageLink
member.summary: The URL of the link which the Weather Underground's logo image is supposed to link to. Please read their terms for use (which is required).

member.name: T:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions
member.summary: A class which exposes instances of various other classes which contain the specific data for the current conditions.

member.name: M:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates this class using your API key only. This will use your IP address to determine your location.
member.param: Your Weather Underground free API key. If you do not yet have one, go to http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/ and sign up for one. It's quite easy.

member.name: M:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates this class using your API key and either your zip code/postal code or an airport code.
member.param: Your Weather Underground free API key. If you do not yet have one, go to http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/ and sign up for one. It's quite easy.
The zip code/postal code or an airport code.

member.name: M:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates this class using your API key, your city's name and either your state's name or the country's name.
member.param: Your Weather Underground free API key. If you do not yet have one, go to http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/ and sign up for one. It's quite easy.
The name of the city (not case-sensitive).
The name of the state or country (not case-sensitive).

member.name: M:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.#ctor(System.String,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Instantiates this class using your API key and a latitude/longitude pair. Note that the latitude and longitude are type Double, not type String!
member.param: Your Weather Underground free API key. If you do not yet have one, go to http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/ and sign up for one. It's quite easy.
The latitude (type Double).
The longitude (type Double).

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.CurrentWeatherConditions
member.summary: The current conditions at this location shown as a formatted string.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.DisplayLocation
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the location of these current conditions.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.ObservationLocation
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the location of the place of observation for these current conditions.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.ObservationTime
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the time of the place of observation for these current conditions.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.Temperature
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current temperature for this location.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.RelativeHumidity
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current relative humidity for this location.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.Wind
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current wind conditions for this location.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.Pressure
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current barometric pressure for this location.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.DewPoint
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current dewpoint temperature for this location.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.HeatIndex
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current heat index temperature for this location (if applicable).

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.WindChill
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current windchill temperature for this location (if applicable).

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.FeelsLikeTemperature
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current "feels like" temperature for this location (if applicable).

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.Visibility
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current visibility for this location.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.Precipitation
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about the current precipitation for this location.

member.name: P:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.CurrentConditions.WeatherIcon
member.summary: An instance of a class which will show information about icons (images) applicable to the current condition for this location.

member.name: T:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.RadarOrSatelliteImage
member.summary: A class which exposes a read-only property for a bitmap of the satellite image for the specified location.

member.name: T:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.RadarOrSatelliteImage.ImageOf
member.summary: An enumerator of the types available for return.

member.name: F:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.RadarOrSatelliteImage.ImageOf.Radar
member.summary: This will return the radar image for the location selected.

member.name: F:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.RadarOrSatelliteImage.ImageOf.Satellite
member.summary: This will return the satellite image for the location selected.

member.name: M:LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.RadarOrSatelliteImage.#ctor(System.String,LaunchMenu.WeatherUndergroundData.RadarOrSatelliteImage.ImageOf,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Instantiates this class using your API key only. This will use your IP address to determine your location.
member.param: Your Weather Underground free API key. If you do not yet have one, go to http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/ and sign up for one. It's quite easy.
Specify what you want returned (either radar or satellite).
The width of the image in pixels (50 min., 1024 max.).
The height of the image in pixels (50 min., 1024 max.).
The zoom level to use (1 min., 2000 max.). Note: Use 100 for most uses.
